Title: Episode 1
Plot: Meredith is having weird visions. The Island of Kaitangata is waking up. For the first time in years there is an earthquake ? the Kaitangata Twitch. Meredith sees a young girl on the Island and discovers she went missing in mysterious circumstances ? 50 years ago!
